welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pickering, Canada! This charming city is known for its beautiful waterfront, vibrant arts scene, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pickering has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Buttonville Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for purchase.
